name: GameJam: ThatGoodParty
description:
That good party is a game about how drugs work and change your environment.

Tou can talk to people with different personalities in a party and see how their attitude changes according your addiction.

We loved the concept so, We will keep this game in development. If you have some suggestions and you would like to change something, please, tell us :)

Enjoy!

Videogame developed by Eric Solà and Fran Ruiz during MiniJam 2nd Edition (2018).

CONTROLS:

* CONTROLLER
  - Move: DPAD and/or Joysticks
  - Interact/impulse: A (X on playstation controller)

* KEYBOARD
  - Move: Arrows
  - Interact/impulse: Q
